meanings.definition: An intense and widely shared enthusiasm for something, especially one that is short-lived.
meanings.sent1: The new toy became a fad among the kids at school.
meanings.sent2: The latest dance craze quickly turned into a fad.
meanings.sent3: The fad for wearing socks with sandals made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with collecting rubber ducks was just a passing fad.
meanings.sent5: The fad for eating avocado toast spread like wildfire.

meanings.definition: A fashion that is taken up with great enthusiasm for a brief period of time.
meanings.sent1: The neon clothing trend was a fad that faded away quickly.
meanings.sent2: She regretted spending so much money on the fad of oversized sunglasses.
meanings.sent3: The fad for wearing mismatched socks made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His interest in magic tricks was just a fad that disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent5: The fad for dyeing hair bright colors was embraced by many teenagers.
